items.description: Sliced portabellas hand battered and deep fried to perfection. Served with a side of ranch

groupDescription: Dressing: ranch, French, Italian, honey mustard, thousand island, bleu cheese, toasted sesame, Caesar, raspberry vinaigrette, balsamic vinaigrette

items.description: Seasonal: September through May

items.description: Romaine lettuce, spring mix, tomato, onion, cucumber and croutons

groupDescription: Includes choice of brew city fries, kettle chips, homemade potato salad or cottage cheese. Substitute sweet potato fries, side salad or soup for $2.29.

items.description: Brisket, bacon, burger... a meat lovers delight. A slow smoked brisket tops a 1/3 pound burger with bacon, chipotle BBQ sauce and three onion rings

groupDescription: Includes choice of brew city fries, kettle chips, homemade potato salad or cottage cheese. Substitute sweet potato fries, side salad or soup for $2.29
